heading: HB01103
0: AN ACT CREATING THE METRO RAIL TRANSIT REGULATORY AUTHORITY TO OVERSEER FARE RATES IN PUBLIC AND/OR PRIVATE RAIL TRANSIT SYSTEMS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01103
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE METRO RAIL TRANSIT REGULATORY AUTHORITY TO OVERSEER FARE RATES IN PUBLIC AND/OR PRIVATE RAIL TRANSIT SYSTEMS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-07-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Belmonte (R.) (000 2018-02-12)2. Nieto (000 2018-03-20)
3. Tambunting (000 2018-09-04)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-01-31
          -A TWG was created, to be chaired by Rep. Mark Go, to consolidate all measures (19)proposing to amend the PNR, create Mindanao Railways and other rail-related measures
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-14
          -1st TWG meeting, chaired by Rep. Go. Secretariat to consolidate the 19 bills and forward substitute bill to the Committees on Appropriations and Ways and Means for comments
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2018-03-14
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON TRANSPORTATION, LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION on 2016-08-01;SECONDARILY REFERRED TO TRANSPORTATION on 2016-08-01;
